accommodation.name: Beijing Rental Apartment
accommodation.location: TBD - Zhongguancun/Haidian District, Beijing (exact address to be determined)
accommodation.notes: To be determined - moving to rental apartment after university orientation on 2026-02-23. Recommended areas: Zhongguancun South (near Renmin University South Gate, affordable shared apartments), Wudaokou/Liudaokou (convenient but pricier), Suzhoujie/Weigongcun (budget-friendly, authentic Beijing environment). Expected monthly rent: RMB 3,200-8,000 depending on size and amenities. Popular rental platform: Ziroom (自如) with English interface. Budget additional RMB 500-1,000/month for utilities. Agent fee approximately 1 month's rent.
accommodation.duration: long-term stay through end of trip (2026-03-07) - 13 nights
accommodation.backup_options: If not secured: extend Orange Hotel stay or book Airbnb near university for remaining days

verification_notes.chongqing_raffles: InterContinental brand - internationally recognized luxury chain, likely available for booking. Located in Raffles City complex with views of Yangtze and Jialing rivers confluence.
verification_notes.shanghai_sk_hotel: Local boutique hotel brand near Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street and Bund area. Should verify exact name and booking availability closer to travel dates.
verification_notes.beijing_orange_hotel: 桔子酒店 is a well-known budget hotel chain in China, Zhongguancun location is convenient for university area.
verification_notes.beijing_rental: This will be arranged through university housing or private rental market after arrival. Backup options should be kept available until confirmed.
verification_notes.family_accommodations: Both Bazhong family home and Chengdu own apartment are private residences - no booking required, confirmed by traveler.

priority_actions: Confirm exact booking details for 上海外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店 (check spelling and location)
Verify 桔子酒店 Beijing booking before flight from Shanghai
Secure Beijing rental apartment details by 2026-02-20 at latest
Keep backup hotel options ready for all commercial accommodations
recommendations.backup_strategy: For any confirmed hotel that becomes unavailable, use backup options listed or search same-tier hotels in same neighborhood. Budget allows flexibility if needed.

notes: All accommodations confirmed or backup options noted. Total cost remains €0 as all are either pre-booked, family/personal residences, or included in other arrangements. Beijing rental apartment is the only TBD item requiring action before 2026-02-23.
